description: This file defines a service module for interacting with a 'weekly_reports' database table via Supabase. It provides functions to create a new weekly report entry and to fetch existing reports, including validation, error handling, and support for testing scenarios.

methods.name: createWeeklyReport({ progress, blockers, plans, week_start, tags, user_id })
methods.description: Inserts a new weekly report record into the database, validating inputs and handling errors, including RLS permission issues.

methods.name: getWeeklyReports(opts = {})
methods.description: Retrieves weekly reports from the database with ordering and limits, handling access control errors.

ctags.name: createWeeklyReport
ctags.pattern: /^export async function createWeeklyReport({ progress, blockers, plans, week_start, tags, user_id /
ctags.signature: ({ progress, blockers, plans, week_start, tags, user_id })
